General.Name: Shanghai HYP-ARCH Architectural Design Consultant Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai HYP-ARCH Architectural Design Consultant Co.,Ltd. provides architectural design services. Its projects include houses, villas, apartments, commercial buildings, office buildings, medical buildings, and pension and health care buildings. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Warehouse No. 270, Depu Binjiang, Shanghai, China, 200135
